subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ángel di María of Argentina, who comes from the same town as Lionel Messi, has excelled at the World Cup and has monopolized the front pages back home.
snippet: Ángel di María of Argentina, who comes from the same town as Lionel Messi, has excelled at the World Cup and has monopolized the front pages back home.
